txt.en:
Congratulations on buying a Premium House! Unlike Classic Housing, you may own as many Premium Houses as you like. If you don't have a VIP account, be sure to pay your weekly upkeep. You can pay up to 26 weeks in advance via the housing management panel.

The House panel contains information about your houses and allows you to travel directly to them.  Access the House panel via the Start menu under 'Character'.

To visit your house, use the travel button on the House panel, use the Travel to Premium House skill, or enter the Neighbourhood Gate on the landscape.
